categories.description:
Optional categories for this configuration, to aid in grouping,
sorting, and searching of configurations.

description.description:
Mandatory description for this configuration.  This is included in the
description output by the builder, following the name.

detail.description:
Optional detailed description for this configuration.  This is included
in the description output by the builder, following name and
description.

name.description:
Optional name for this configuration.  Is included in the description
output by the builder.

notes.description:
Optional notes for this configuration.  This is included in the
description output by the builder, following the list of images/sets.

rom_sets.description:
Array of ROM set configurations.  Note that even if not using complex
features like dynamic banking and multi-ROM sets, each ROM image is in
its own set.
The builder description output lists either "Images" or "Sets"
depending on whether there are any multi-set or banked sets in use.

CsLogic.description: Possible Chip Select line logic options

oneOf.description: Chip Select line is active low
Chip Select line is active high

Used for 2332/2316 ROMs, when a CS line isn't used because it's always
tied active.

Location.description: Location within a larger ROM image that the specific image to use resides

length.description:
Length of the image within the larger ROM image.  Must match the
selected ROM type, or SizeHandling will be applied.

start.description: Start of the image within the larger ROM image

cs1.description: Optional Chip Select 1 logic - only valid for ROM Types that have CS1

cs2.description: Optional Chip Select 2 logic - only valid for ROM Types that have CS2

cs3.description: Optional Chip Select 3 logic - only valid for ROM Types that have CS3

description.description:
Optional description for this configuration.  This is included in the
description output by the builder.

extract.description:
Optional extract path within an archive (zip/tar) if the file pointed
to is an archive.

file.description:
Filename or URL of the ROM image - filename is only valid if using a
generator tool with local file access.  This is passed to the generator
tool to retrieve the ROM image.

label.description:
Optional label for this ROM image.  If specified, this is used in
metadata instead of the filename (which itself can be complex if
extracting a file from an image and providing location information)

license.description:
Optional license URL/identifier for the ROM.  This is passed to the
generator tool to retrieve and ask the user to accept before building.

location.description:
Optional location within a larger image file.  Used to specify start
offset and length within the file.  Useful when multiple ROM images
are concatenated into a single file and one needs to be extracted.

size_handling.description:
Optional size handling configuration for this ROM.  Used to specify
handling when the image supplied isn't the correct size for this ROM
type.

description.description:
Optional description for this ROM set.  This is included in the
description output by the builder.

roms.description:
Array of ROM configurations in this set.  Contains 1 member for single
ROM sets, and multiple members for multi-ROM and banked ROM sets.

oneOf.description: Single ROM - the default

Set of dynamically banked ROMs. Used to switch between active ROM at
runtime using jumpers

Set of multiple ROMs selected by CS lines.  This allows a single One
ROM to serve up to 3 ROM sockets simultaneously.
512B EPROM with multiple supply voltages - 512 bytes, 24-pin package
1KB EPROM with multiple supply voltages - 1024 bytes, 24-pin package
2KB mask ROM with 3 configurable CS lines - 2048 bytes, 24-pin package
2KB EPROM with fixed active-low CE/OE - 2048 bytes, 24-pin package
4KB mask ROM with 2 configurable CS lines - 4096 bytes, 24-pin package
4KB EPROM with fixed active-low CE and shared OE/VPP - 4096 bytes, 24-pin package
8KB mask ROM with 1 configurable CS line - 8192 bytes, 24-pin package
8KB EPROM with fixed active-low CE/OE - 8192 bytes, 28-pin package
16KB mask ROM with 3 configurable CS lines - 16384 bytes, 28-pin package
16KB EPROM with fixed active-low CE/OE - 16384 bytes, 28-pin package
32KB mask ROM with 2 configurable CS lines - 32768 bytes, 28-pin package
32KB EPROM with fixed active-low CE/OE - 32768 bytes, 28-pin package
64KB mask ROM with 2 configurable CS lines - 65536 bytes, 28-pin package
64KB EPROM with fixed active-low CE/OE - 65536 bytes, 28-pin package

SizeHandling.description: How to handle ROM images that are too small for the ROM type

oneOf.description:
No special handling.  Errors if the image size does not exactly match
the ROM size.

Duplicates the image as many times as needed to fill the ROM.  Errors
if the image size is not an exact divisor of the ROM size.

Truncates the image to fit the ROM size.  Errors if the image is an
exact match size-wise.
Pads the image out with [`PAD_BLANK_BYTE`].
